description: React functional component implementing a calendar UI widget with month navigation and date selection, based on provided slots and selected date.

methods.name: getMonthDays
methods.description: Calculates and returns all the days in a given month and year as an array of Date objects.

methods.name: Calendar
methods.description: Main React component rendering the calendar with navigation and date selection functionalities.

methods.name: isAvailable
methods.description: Checks if a given date is available based on the slots array.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.description: Checks if a given date is currently selected.
